Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: If my hands sins I got to lose it I fight the flesh like I’m in a John Woo flick Stay red-alert like it’s the bomb threat Chosen by God election-John 10 We kill that sin to fuel our affections So everyday is like a funeral procession That’s called the sanctification process In the local church that’s the context We in a war Christian, furnish your sword Die to the world-sever that cord By God’s grace go earn them rewards Show the city you would die even burn on a cross Cause the world is watching ya’ Clocking every move on their speedometer Eager to see where your eyes are fixed Is it Christ or chicks- this is life or death
CHORUS: We put that sin to death Till we aint got no strength left We mortify the deeds of the flesh Even if it takes our last breath
{new_page} Verse 2: Any where on the 3rd rock, 3rd dimension We neuter sin like it’s in the 3rd declension Some wolves try to creep up in the flock That’s when we like stop- herd inspection The Word of God be the lamp for my feet Keeps my life pointed in a certain direction Rescue mission: God pulled me out the belly of the world like caesarean section We know the reason the Son was crushed That’s why we rather bleed than succumb to lust Communion is sweet when you dutifully keep Sins weeds from your heart like tares from wheat But killing sin is the Spirits working So look to the cross as He tears the curtain Remove iniquity that’s why Christ was born So you can die to the world- get your life transformed
Verse 3: The world is sick they need the great physician They think their ancestors are apes and fishes Can’t stand to see their own face in the mirror So they buy implants and get their faces lifted They got the whole thing twisted God aint impressed with the major gifted Nah, He takes a sinner then breaks addiction Removes iniquity then makes him Christian But not mint condition Sanctification be the daily business Teaching the Bible, making disciples, Baptizing them- that’s the Great Commission So we pray for wisdom Lean on the Word when we make decisions One God, one faith it aint Islam Mohammed’s still dead- Christ is risen
CHORUS x2
